traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.detail: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Death's Weapons
traits.detail: Your weapon attacks are magical and automatically hit.

actions.name: Emerald Scythe
actions.detail: _Automatic Hit:_ 4d8+7 slashing damage, plus 4d8 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Blight
actions.detail: A creature within 30' of Lutheria must make a DC 21 CON save or take 13d8 necrotic damage (half damage on save).

actions.name: Lutheria's Hideous Laughter
actions.detail: One creature within 30' of Lutheria must make a DC 21 WIS save or become incapacitated, laughing uncontrollably (save ends).

actions.name: Madness
actions.detail: One creature must make a DC 24 WIS save or be afflicted with the effects of _confusion_ (save ends).

actions.name: Disrupt Life (uses Inspiration)
actions.detail: Each non-undead creature within 20' of Lutheria must make a DC 24 CON save or take [44, d10] necrotic damage (half damage on save).

reactions.name: Inspiration (7 uses)
reactions.detail: Lutheria automatically succeeds on a failed saving throw or ability check.
